meanings.definition: Organisms that live on the outside of a host organism and feed off of it.
meanings.sent1: Ectoparasites can be found on the skin of animals.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian treated the dog for ectoparasites.
meanings.sent3: The ectoparasites on the cat seemed to be having a party on its fur.
meanings.sent4: The garden was overrun with ectoparasites, draining the plants of nutrients.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the concept of ectoparasites in their science class.

meanings.definition: An external parasite that lives on the skin or outer surface of its host.
meanings.sent1: Ectoparasites like ticks can cause diseases in animals.
meanings.sent2: The presence of ectoparasites on the bird's feathers was concerning.
meanings.sent3: The ectoparasites on the squirrel were throwing a tiny parade.
meanings.sent4: The city was infested with ectoparasites, clinging to every available surface.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explained the life cycle of ectoparasites in a simple way.
